title: WELL I JUST WANTED THE COMMUNITY TO SEE MY CHAT LOG FOR ENTERTAINMENT
body:
LET'S SEE WHAT I GOT MY CHAT BANNED FOR SHALL WE?

I BET YOU MIGHT GET A LAUGH...   I'M SURE I WILL! 

Game 1
F3ORA: draven quit?
F3ORA: ranked op
F3ORA: ks
F3ORA: way to throw
F3ORA: late commer
F3ORA: reported for "dumbass"
F3ORA: teamwork op
F3ORA: reported for "useless"
F3ORA: do you?
F3ORA: try poking instead of talking
F3ORA: you arent even playing it your talking smack
F3ORA: and going afk
F3ORA: teamates who want you to die in ranked op
F3ORA: teamates who dont play and talk smack op
F3ORA: ks
F3ORA: dont ks me it throws
F3ORA: how can you win if you all steal from the carry
F3ORA: talk smack on the carry ... never help then steal the kill last hit
F3ORA: how illiterate are you?
F3ORA: too bad you didnt come sooner
F3ORA: you could have
F3ORA: thats why im good and you're bad
F3ORA: you dont help your teamates... you ks last shot on the carry and have a low level by the turret talking smack
F3ORA: thats you nasus
F3ORA: then you blame it on me when we do bad
F3ORA: dont help your teamates... want them to die... yet wonder why you arent winning
F3ORA: it makes sense so you cant handle it and tell me to play minecraft
F3ORA: logic is too much for you vlad
F3ORA: i must have the brain damage
F3ORA: cause no one else will ... so ranked games dont happen unless i do
F3ORA: everybody knows the support gets juked...
F3ORA: teemo is anything
F3ORA: you guys think hes a top cause youre noobs
F3ORA: people who quit at 20 in ranked vlad...   how do you expect to get ahead in ranked? isn't that the point"?   you must be new
F3ORA: once again logic goes out the other ear
F3ORA: dont ks me vlad
F3ORA: 6 ks... in a row on the carry
F3ORA: early game ks matter
F3ORA: of course im the carry im famous
F3ORA: we win by default cause im here and you wanna surrender vlad
F3ORA: surrender in ranked no less...
F3ORA: are you surrendering in your promos?
F3ORA: well its irrelevant
F3ORA: when you weaken your carry you wont win
F3ORA: when you talk smack on the best fiora in all of leauges you get reported
F3ORA: Ammu afk op
F3ORA: teemo ad can be good
F3ORA: i get op with teemo ad allot
F3ORA: im just unconventional
F3ORA: you think good is cookie cutter? no
F3ORA: you 7 are still in teh cookie cutter days
F3ORA: ive played 1000's of games on fiora
F3ORA: you are all new compared to me
F3ORA: riot reworked fiora cause my level 1 pentakills
F3ORA: i got banned from ranked and they reworked my champ
F3ORA: keep tellin yourself
F3ORA: if im bad its cause my team juked my kills and exp... wich they did
F3ORA: stop calling people dumbass...  it's a violation of the summoners code
F3ORA: teemo will defend solo
F3ORA: ammu afk

Game 2
F3ORA: dont boss me around i was the best fiora in all of leauges
F3ORA: group 5 all game long or you are bad
F3ORA: ever watch youtube pros play?
F3ORA: they do
F3ORA: i am doing whatever i want
F3ORA: bot why zero support during the gank go back to bots
F3ORA: dont gank bot ever gain
F3ORA: some people are just bad thats why this is bronze
F3ORA: teamwork op
F3ORA: gg
F3ORA: bot is just bad... remember when we came to gank bot and you both just stood there at turret twiddling?
F3ORA: well teemo is gonna be stubborn so
F3ORA: thats not a gank xin
F3ORA: you are just taking my cs
F3ORA: go away
F3ORA: "a gank is when you go behind them xin never jg again in ranked
F3ORA: teemo plz dont call me stupid its a violation of the summoners code
F3ORA: where was jinx?
F3ORA: look at her
F3ORA: what the crap
F3ORA: i cant finish the double kill cause jinx is behind me catching cs
F3ORA: when you want your teamate to die in ranked you wont climb the ladder very well jinx
F3ORA: We are gonna win cause im here
F3ORA: you guys can ff at 20
F3ORA: dont bait me
F3ORA: if you quit in ranked how the hell do you expect to climb it?
F3ORA: report the quitters
F3ORA: Report teemo for quitting in ranked...  how stupid can you get
F3ORA: im the only one to break a turret fyi
F3ORA: where is YOUR effort
F3ORA: more exp for you jinx
F3ORA: thats how i get bot op
F3ORA: where is otp
F3ORA: mid
F3ORA: I have 2500ms lagg now
F3ORA: everything is 4 seconds late
F3ORA: i wish you were witty teemo
F3ORA: only noobs surrender'
F3ORA: you can win bad games... if you played the game enough youd know that
F3ORA: games turn around... and you don't know it yet.
F3ORA: im here
F3ORA: i was the best Fiora...  its not a lie
F3ORA: Fiora is nerfed cause i was so good
F3ORA: fiora is currently defending super minions on her own
F3ORA: can fiora solo nexus vs 5? well see

Game 3
F3ORA: hi
F3ORA: im teemo
F3ORA: i used to be the best fiora in all of leauges
F3ORA: but riot nerfed my champ and banned me from ranked
F3ORA: cause i was getting level 1 pentakills in bronze all the time
F3ORA: 40 and 0 trolling noobs
F3ORA: i have over 2kms lagg
F3ORA: nothing i can do with that kinda lagg
F3ORA: lux will just nuke me
F3ORA: gank bot soon
F3ORA: or just blind farm like every other bad jungle
F3ORA: ekko gank us
F3ORA: ugg 3 of them?
F3ORA: around a corner?
F3ORA: teamwork op
F3ORA: gg bot
F3ORA: you win
F3ORA: jungler is floundering about the map again
F3ORA: like every jungler seems to at this elo
F3ORA: thanks to poor teamwork
F3ORA: do you think i would have a low score if i had good teamwork? no
F3ORA: not true
F3ORA: good scores require good teamwork
F3ORA: maybe that was true before riot nerfed my champ fiora
F3ORA: only  noobs quit
F3ORA: never quit in ranked
F3ORA: im the only one defending and i cant control my champ cause the lagg
F3ORA: you are a dumb fat tank
F3ORA: with a big mouth
F3ORA: when the carry has to play support for the game to even exist...   \has a ton of lagg and poor teamwork
F3ORA: juked support experience
F3ORA: and a big mouth garen top
F3ORA: my girlfriend always loads a movie on the other computer when i play ranked
F3ORA: teemo will defend

replies.body:
Calling yourself good 
Bronze 5
13W 40L

Nice Meme
I blame my teamates.  And Riot for nerfing Fiora to be mean to me...

oHHH I called Sej a big dumb fat tank and she didn't even mind she thought it was cute. What did I really say that was bad?  I think it just shows you an up close look at what a good player feels like playing with bad players.

RIOT LET ME OFF THE HOOK! 
RIOT LET ME OFF THE HOOK! 
RIOT LET ME OFF THE HOOK! 
RIOT LET ME OFF THE HOOK! 
RIOT LET ME OFF THE HOOK! 
RIOT LET ME OFF THE HOOK! 
RIOT LET ME OFF THE HOOK! 
RIOT LET ME OFF THE HOOK! 
RIOT LET ME OFF THE HOOK! 
Fix Fiora back to normal so I don't have to rely on bad players to win!
